thread.title: Pennsylvania State Police Seize Over $18 Million in Cocaine and $16 Million in Heroin in the Third Quarter of 2015
thread.title_full: Pennsylvania State Police Seize Over $18 Million in Cocaine and $16 Million in Heroin in the Third Quarter of 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Pennsylvania State Police Seize Over $18 Million in Cocaine and $16 Million in Heroin in the Third Quarter of 2015
text:
Pennsylvania State Police
HARRISBURG, Pa. , Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Pennsylvania State Police today announced troopers seized over $42 million in heroin, marijuana and other prohibited drugs in the third quarter of 2015.
In the third quarter of 2015, troopers seized over 416 pounds of cocaine and over 47 pounds of heroin with a combined approximate street value of $34 million . In addition, state police seized over 15 pounds of methamphetamines valued at over $720,000 and over 1,500 pounds of marijuana with an estimated value over $4.5 million .
In 2014, the state police seized over $107 million in prohibited drugs.
For more information about the Pennsylvania State Police, visit their website at www.psp.pa.gov .
MEDIA CONTACTS: Tpr. Adam Reed , 717-783-5556
